mapper.select: select id, singer_id, name, introduction, create_time, update_time, pic, url, lyric from song

SELECT s.id,s.singer_id,s.name,s.introduction,s.pic,s.lyric,s.url,s.create_time FROM song s
AND s.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
AND s.introduction like CONCAT('%',#{introduction},'%')
AND s.lyric like CONCAT('%',#{lyric},'%')
select id from song where url = #{songUrl};

select s.id, s.name, s.introduction, s.create_time, s.update_time, s.pic, s.url, s.lyric from song s left join singer_song ss on ss.song_id = s.id left join singer si on si.id = ss.singer_id where si.id = #{singerId}

select s.id, s.name, s.introduction, s.create_time, s.update_time, s.pic, s.url, s.lyric from song s left join songlist_song ss on ss.song_id = s.id left join song_list sl on sl.id = ss.songlist_id where sl.id = #{songListId}
